title: Active Directory Certificate (com.apple.ADCertificate.managed)
description: The payload that configures Active Directory Certificate settings.

Description.title: Description
Description.description: A user-friendly description of the certification identity.

CertServer.title: Certificate Server
CertServer.description: The fully qualified host name of the CA.

CertificateAuthority.title: Certificate Authority
CertificateAuthority.description:
The name of the certificate authority (CA), which is determined from the common name (CN) of the Active Directory entry. Available in macOS 10.8 and later. Valid values:

- CN=<your CA Name>
- CN='Certification Authorities'
- CN='Public Key Services'
- CN='Services'
- CN='Configuration'
- CN=<your base Domain Name>

CertTemplate.title: Certificate Template
CertTemplate.description: The certificate template for your environment. The default user certificate value is \'User\'. The default computer certificate value is \'Machine\'.

CertificateAcquisitionMechanism.title: Certificate Acquisition Mechanism
CertificateAcquisitionMechanism.description: This value is most commonly 'RPC'; if using web enrollment, use 'HTTP'. Available in macOS 10.8 and later.

CertificateRenewalTimeInterval.title: Certificate Renewal Time Interval
CertificateRenewalTimeInterval.description: The number of days in advance of certificate expiration that the notification center notifies the user.

Keysize.title: Key Size
Keysize.description: The RSA key size for the certificate signing request (CSR). Available in macOS 10.11 and later.

PromptForCredentials.title: Prompt for Credentials
PromptForCredentials.description: If 'true', the system prompts the user for credentials when is installs the profile. This key applies only to user certificates with the Manual Download profile delivery method. Omit this key for computer certificates. Available in macOS 10.8 and later.

UserName.title: User name
UserName.description: The user name with which to authenticate to the certificate server

Password.title: Password
Password.description: The password with which to authenticate to the certificate server

AllowAllAppsAccess.title: Allow All Apps Access
AllowAllAppsAccess.description: If 'true', gives apps access to the private key. Available in macOS 10.10 and later.

KeyIsExtractable.title: Key Is Extractable
KeyIsExtractable.description: If 'true', the system allows exporting the private key. Available in macOS 10.10 and later.

EnableAutoRenewal.title: Enable Auto Renewal
EnableAutoRenewal.description: If 'true', the certificate obtained with this payload attempts auto-renewal. Auto-renewal can only be used with device Active Directory certificate payloads. Available in macOS 10.13.4 and later.
